title: BOOTLEGGER'S DRIVE-IN SATURDAY NIGHT - NIGHT TIDE & HORROR HOTEL

sources.title: BOOTLEGGER'S DRIVE-IN SATURDAY NIGHT - NIGHT TIDE & HORROR HOTEL
sources.description: A COMPLETE DVD SIMPLE BURN INSTRUCTIONS: Download the zipped folder, open it, extract the VIDEO_TS folder and burn it, that's the easiest way. I've also uploaded the files outside the .zip so they can be viewed here on this site. This disc contains the movies NIGHT TIDE & HORROR HOTEL, along with the preview and intermission reels, laid out like an old drive-in show
